name: Snake (EmeraldStreak)
description:
A recreation of the classic game, Snake.

Changes to the classic version of Snake include:

  • Many food pellets on-screen at once
  • Snake grows multiple units after eating a single food pellet

Attributions:

Music is "Grey Sector 8-Bit" by FoxSynergy (https://opengameart.org/content/grey-sector-8-bit)

8-bit Platformer SFX commissioned by Mark McCorkle for OpenGameArt.org ( https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-platformer-sfx )
